Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44792 affecting package net-snmp for versions less than 5.9.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-44792 affecting package net-snmp for versions less than 5.9.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package net-snmp is earlier than 5.9.4-1, affected by CVE-2022-44792
